mapper.select: select v.id v_id, v.name v_name, v.img_path v_img_path, v.video_path_webm v_video_path_webm, v.video_path_ogg v_video_path_ogg, v.video_path_mp4 v_video_path_mp4, v.description v_description, v.update_time v_update_time, c.id c_id, c.name c_name, c.phone c_phone, c.email c_email, c.description c_description, c.update_time c_update_time, ca.id ca_id, ca.name ca_name, ca.description ca_description, ca.update_time ca_update_time from video v, client c, category ca where c.id = v.client_id and ca.id = v.category_id and v.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into video (name, client_id, category_id, img_path, video_path_webm, video_path_ogg, video_path_mp4, description) values (#{name},#{client.id}, #{category.id}, #{imgPath}, #{videoPathWebm}, #{videoPathOgg}, #{videoPathMp4}, #{description})
mapper.update: update video set name = #{name}, client_id = #{client_id}, category_id = #{category_id}, img_path = #{imgPath}, video_path_webm = #{videoPathWebm}, video_path_ogg = #{videoPathOgg}, video_path_mp4 = #{videoPathMp4}, description = #{description}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
